content: this beautiful mocha latte hat has a great texture and works up quickly it is the perfect compliment to the mocha latte scarf this pattern is one of the january contributions to the 2025 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 56-236 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn i used lion brand made with love in the marvelous mushroom colorway * size i 5 5 mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
